Puthutta，（Puthatta） （nt．） [fr．puthu，cp．Sk．*pṛthutva； not with Kern，Toev．s．v．=Sk．pṛthaktva，speciality，peculiarity] being at variance，diversity S．II，77 （opp．ekatta； v．l．SS puthatta）．At A．IV，97 we have to read puth’attānaṁ for puthuttānaṁ which has nothing to do with puthutta，but is puthu+attānaṁ as borne out by v．l．puthujj’attānaṁ，and by AA：puthu nānākāraṇehi attānaṁ hanti．（Page 466）

puthutta：ပုထု-တ္တ （န）
ထူးခြားသည်၏အဖြစ်။
